comments:
If you try to create a new grid project and you didn't specified any VO nothing happens. Neither an error dialogue nor wizard appears.

At least a proper error dialog with proper solution should appear.

Mateusz, i cannot reproduce it on Linux:
by default on the "New Grid Project" wizard the default VO is selected, and if i unselect it then the "Finish" and "Next >" buttons are greyed out, and i get an error icon with the text
  "No valid VO is selected"
on the top of the wizard, see attached screenshot. Or i am getting you wrong?

Can you please try to check on a Linux machine?

Created an attachment (id=83591)
New project wizard screenshot

Ah! i understand now. Thanks for the stacktrace, i see. I'll take care of it.

Fixed, please check that it works for you and close this bug if so.

If there are no defined VOs then the wizard pops up empty, and the user needs to create a new VO at that poit to be able to continue.
